name: Mini Adventure (Zhenyi)
description:
Made by Zhenyi Wei and Yuheng Xie in Gamejam 2021.

This game is called miniadventure. It is a 2D-puzzle  game. Player will get different functions in the way of reaching the magic door to go to next level. Those functions will help players to move forward, however, some functions have negative effects. Besides, player can only carry five features in maximum. If player gets the sixth feature, they need to decide which one to lose. It is through losing and finding features that play can reach the ultimate goal.

Core gameplay

There are nine features in total. Four of them are operational buttons. They are up, left, right and jump. They correspond to the button of up, left, right (or w,a,d) and space on the keyboard. 

Other five features are gravity, spines, heart, view and coin. Player can jump once they have the feature of gravity, and will lose the ability to go up (disable the up button) at the meantime. Spines will appear in the map if player have the spine feature. Heart enables player to have two extra lives. View enables play to see the whole map, otherwise they can only see a limited space. Player can eat coin only if they get the coin feature. In some maps, coins will be the condition to enter into the next level.

Controls

Up / w ——  Move up
Left / a —— Move left
Right / d —— Move right
Space —— Jump
Mouse drag —— Change features' postions
Mouse click —— Click button
